results.deck: Polyphony Digital is a Japanese video game developer, best known for its Gran Turismo franchise.
results.description: Polyphony Digital is a Japanese video game developer, and a part of Sony Computer Entertainment. The company was founded in 1998, and is best known for its Gran Turismo racing game series. Other games developed by the company include Tourist Trophy and Omega Boost. Polyphony Digital is led by Kazunori Yamauchi, who is also the designer of the Gran Turismo games.
results.name: Polyphony Digital Inc.

game.name: Tourist Trophy: The Real Riding Simulator
